DOC.brief_summary: The aim study analyze efficacy several variation already validate Positive Psychology Intervention ( PPI ) call Best Possible Self flourish population . This do mobile app specially design aim . Concretely , design permit compare classic intervention ( BPS Future ) , new variation ( BPS Past ) , combination component ( BPS Past+Future ) . Participants randomly assign one 3 condition , practice intervention two week : - BPS-PAST + BPS FUT condition : Participants practice BPS Past one week , switch BPS future another week . - BPS-FUT condition : Participants practice BPS Future two week . - CONTROL condition : Participants practice DAILY ACTIVITIES two week .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Positive Psychology Intervention Through Mobile App
DOC.detailed_description: The design permit two comparison : After first week intervention , participant answer assessment . It permit compare BPS PAST , BPS FUTURE CONTROL condition ( pre-post ) . After second week , participant answer assessment possible compare BPS PAST + BPS FUTURE combination , BPS FUTURE , CONTROL condition .
DOC.criteria: Participants must 18 year old old . Participants must willing participate study . Participants must smartphone ( Android Ios ) . To suffer moderate depression anxiety ( score 11 high ) measure Hospital Anxiety Depression Scale ( HADS ; Zigmond & Snaith , 1983 ) . To `` Flourishing mental health '' measure Mental Health Continuum Short Form ( MHCSF ; Keyes , 2009 )
